body: The format for Manhwa is really annoying to me. I hate how long and thin every page is...

From how this story's been going, she'll probably kill him and be discovered by the other men who'll get her to gangbang them in exchange for their silence and not killing her new bf since he's wounded OR that guy will have exposed her on the boat and turned everyone against her which ends up in a gangbang either way. Part of me wants to see her get DPed...
Damn it! I hate this fuck! How the hell did he get on and how did he know they were on a boat? Su-ae must kill him without losing anything in return.
